  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205465</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Refugee: From Phnom Penh to San Francisco</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Flüchtling: Von Phnom Penh nach San 
Francisco</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réfugié : De Phnom Penh à San Francisco</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Refugee: De Phnom Penh a San Francisco</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rifugiato: Da Phnom Penh a San Francisco</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόσφυγας: Από Phnom Penh στο Σαν Φρανσίσκο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Refugiado: De Phnom Penh a San Francisco</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The film "Refugee" follows three young Cambodian American men on their journey to Cambodia to find family members. This lesson challenges students to examine historical and contemporary topics from multiple perspectives.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Film "Flüchtling" folgt drei jungen 
kambodschanischen amerikanischen Männern auf ihrer Reise nach 
Kambodscha, um Familie Bauteile zu finden. Diese Lektion fordert
Kursteilnehmer heraus, die historischen und zeitgenössischen Themen 
von den mehrfachen Perspektiven zu überprüfen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le film "réfugié" suit trois jeunes hommes 
américains cambodgiens sur leur voyage au Cambodge pour trouver des 
membres de famille. Cette leçon défie des étudiants 
d'examiner des sujets historiques et contemporains des perspectives 
multiples.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A película "refugee" segue três homens 
americanos cambodian novos em sua viagem a Cambodia para encontrar 
membros da família. Esta lição desafia estudantes examinar 
tópicos históricos e contemporary dos perspectives múltiplos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La pellicola "rifugiato" segue tre uomini 
americani cambogiani giovani sul loro viaggio in Cambogia per trovare 
i membri della famiglia. Questa lezione sfida gli allievi ad 
esaminare i soggetti storici e contemporanei dalle prospettive 
multiple.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ταινία "πρόσφυγασ" ακολουθεί τρία νέα καμποτζιανά 
αμερικανικά άτομα στο ταξίδι τους στην Καμπότζη για να βρεί τα 
οικογενειακά μέλη. Αυτό το μάθημα προκαλεί τους σπουδαστές
για να εξετάσει τα ιστορικά και σύγχρονα θέματα από τις 
πολλαπλάσιες προοπτικές.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La película "refugiado" sigue a tres hombres 
americanos camboyanos jóvenes en su viaje a Camboya para encontrar a 
miembros de la familia. Esta lección desafía a estudiantes a 
examinar asuntos históricos y contemporáneos de perspectivas 
múltiples.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <value>yes</value>

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
